sentences.english: It is arrange in pairs database of the field that make disambiguation do.
sentences.chinese: 并针对该领域建立了搭配知识库，作为消歧的依据。

sentences.english: Add this information to the knowledge base.
sentences.chinese: 将这些信息添加到知识库中。

sentences.english: Both countries have a rich knowledge base to work from.
sentences.chinese: 这两个国家都有可供使用的丰富的知识库。

sentences.english: Now the decision plan can leverage the knowledge base.
sentences.chinese: 现在决策计划就可以利用知识库了。

sentences.english: With each iteration, you should have a better performing knowledge base.
sentences.chinese: 每次执行完迭代后，都应该有一个性能更好的知识库。

sentences.english: Another peculiar resident of the depths is the Mon Calamari Knowledge Bank.
sentences.chinese: 另外一个海底深处的特殊栖息者是蒙克莱梅利知识库。

sentences.english: Load all items in the knowledge base.
sentences.chinese: 装载知识库中的所有东西。

sentences.english: Get the most recent knowledge base from the database.
sentences.chinese: 从数据库中获取最新的知识库。

sentences.english: A folder can be created in the root collection of the repository or in a subfolder of the repository.
sentences.chinese: 您可以在知识库的根集下或者子文件夹中创建文件夹。

sentences.english: The realization of an intelligent automatic color harmony system with a knowledge base is presented.
sentences.chinese: 阐述了带有知识库的智能化自动色彩协调系统的实现。

sentences.english: The paper demonstrates an innovation and efficient implementation of ICAI domain knowledge base and its application.
sentences.chinese: 领域知识库是教学内容的源泉和教学决策的依据。

sentences.english: The method commences with the extraction of the existing knowledge base from the rules engine.
sentences.chinese: 此方法首先从规则引擎中取得已有知识库。

sentences.english: Using the corpus as input, you can create and test the KB.
sentences.chinese: 以文集作为输入，可以创建和测试知识库。

sentences.english: A layered and blocked strategy is proposed for the organization and management of such an integrated kno…
sentences.chinese: 提出了知识库组织的分层分块管理策略。

sentences.english: The reasoner is used to identify the car emblem by the use of the knowledge base.
sentences.chinese: 推理机是利用知识库中的知识进行车徽识别的过程。

sentences.english: Now you can add the new element to the knowledge base.
sentences.chinese: 现在，可以把新元素添加到知识库中。

definition: to parse/analysis processing/to analyze and treat
methodology/Discours de la méthode by René Descartes 笛卡兒|笛卡儿[Di2 ka3 er2], 1637
